events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I ordered.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund based on keywords relating to refund request and incorrect product delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request regarding the incorrectly delivered item.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your refund for the wrong product you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can proceed with your refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and the photo attached shows the wrong item. I’m quite disappointed because I needed the original product urgently.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and arrange for the incorrect item to be returned at no cost to you.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to cover the return costs. Thank you for handling this professionally.
The refund has been processed to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received and if there's anything more we can assist you with.
As we have not received any further inquiries, the case related to your refund request has now been closed. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding the handling of your refund case to help us improve our service.
